short_summary: Spray patching along Alaska Highway, BCM
description: Spray patching in various location from Km 555 to Km 968 along Alaska Highway, BC.
full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify - Non-Structural Spray Patching 
#### BC Highway 97, Alaska Highway

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has issued an invitation to qualify for Non-Structural Spray Patching services along the Alaska Highway in BC. The tender number is WS4427339031.

#### Tender Summary

* **Project Location**: Km 555 to Km 968, Alaska Highway, BC
* **Tender Reference Number**: WS4427339031-Doc4427395157
* **Amendment Number**: 0
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-22T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-03-29

### Service Description

This tender invites contractors to provide Non-Structural Spray Patching services for the repair of various road sections along the Alaska Highway in BC. The scope of work includes, but is not limited to:

* High-quality road surface repair using non-structural spray patching methods.
* Work will be carried out at various locations between Km 555 to Km 968 along the Alaska Highway.
* The project is anticipated to start on June 1, 2024, and be completed by September 30, 2024.

### Selection Criteria

The selection of a qualified contractor will be based on the lowest price offered.

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact Ngan, Ken (SPAC/PSPC), at **ken.ngan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca** or by visiting the discovery portal at **https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18725870?extsite=MTg3MjU4NzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==**

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization (WTO) Agreement.

This rewritten entry has been structured to provide a clear and concise summary of the tender requirements, while adhering to the original message and details. The formatting has been adjusted to meet the recommended word count and to enhance readability.  The rewritten text is an official invitation that is valid and usable as an actual invitation. I made some minor adjustments to the text as I thought a bit clearer and concise. keep in mind open public advisories to maintain every necessary information. Please review it.  feel free to request changes if you believe more information should be included.
